controlled_vocabulary.comment: This table provides the restricted vocabulary for the column model description in the table scanner and is used to describe the technology source for scanning the array. It is only relevant in array technologies

term.name: GeneArray_Scanner
term.description: gene chip scanner used by Affymetrix with the GeneChip, made by Hewlett Packard

term.name: Arrayer_Scanner
term.description: microarray scanner used by Affymetrix, was the GMS 418 before Affymetrix acquired Genetic Microsystems

term.name: GMS
term.description: the GMS 418 microarray scanner from Genetic Microsystems, now owned and marketed by Affymetrix

term.name: arrayWoRx
term.description: microarray scanner from Applied Precision, Issaquah WA

term.name: Imagene
term.description: microarray scanner from BioDiscovery Inc., of Los Angeles, CA

term.name: ScanArray
term.description: microarray scanner from Cartesian Technologies Inc, Irvine CA

term.name: Genorama
term.description: microarray scanner from Asper Ltd., Estonia

term.name: FluorChem
term.description: microarray scanner made by AlphaInnotek, San Leandro CA

term.name: DNA_Microarray_Scanner
term.description: microarray scanner used by Agilent Technologies
